snippet.title: ZIX Gameplay Reveal Footage | VR Games Showcase Spring 2025
snippet.description:
Wishlist Zix on Quest and PC VR: https://linktr.ee/ZixVRGS

Revealing new gameplay from ZIX, an ambitious 3-player co-op roguelike coming to Meta Quest and PC VR, Fall 2025!

Become an Acolyte of Zix and spread chaos across the universe in this fast-paced co-op VR action roguelike. Invade unique worlds to extract their elements, then use those elements to shape future runs. Explore and discover new combinations as you delve into Zix’s many secrets.
__________________________________

facebook.com/vrgamesshowcase

tiktok.com/@vrgamesshowcase

#zix #vr #coop
